solution_line_template: He is able to carry {total_initial_fruit_weight} pounds of watermelon, grapes, and oranges because{watermelon_weight}+{grapes_weight}+ {oranges_weight} = <<{total_initial_fruit_weight}={total_initial_fruit_weight}>>{total_initial_fruit_weight}
He can buy {apples_can_buy} pounds of apple because{bookbag_capacity}-{total_initial_fruit_weight} = <<{bookbag_capacity}-{total_initial_fruit_weight}={apples_can_buy}>>{apples_can_buy}
